Class IntralipidScatterer

Namespace
Vts.SpectralMapping
Assembly
Vts.dll

An intralipid scatterer, based on Mie theory fit to experimental data by van Staveren et al. For more info, visit http://omlc.ogi.edu/spectra/intralipid/index.html

public class IntralipidScatterer : BindableObject, INotifyPropertyChangedPlus, INotifyPropertyChanged, IScatterer
